structure.unit: RIGHTS OF ACTION AND SURVIVAL OF ACTIONS

text.section: Nothing in KRS 411.270 to 411.282 shall be construed to hinder or otherwise affect the employment, agency, or contractual relationship between and among homeowners and home inspectors during the process of inspection, and nothing in KRS 411.270 to 411.282 precludes the termination of those relationships as allowed under other law.
Noncompliance by the client with KRS 411.276 shall not operate as an affirmative defense in an action against a home inspector by the client for emergency repairs.

law.history: Created 2004 Ky. Acts ch. 109, sec. 26, effective July 13, 2004.
